commitResults.messageTitle: Complete basic level 1 functionalities (to add aesthetic features later on) and omit class files in .gitignore
Add and List functionality working and create Task class
Add status icon and done functionality
Add ToDo, Event and Deadline tasks and user guide command
Warning Fixes for Duke.java
Enable automated text UI testing
Create DukeException class to handle erroneous input
Add delete functionality and exception handling
Update tests to include delete tests
Refactoring of code from main method to run method
Further refactoring of code in run method
Add JavaDocs and minor bug fixes for deadlineCommand and eventCommand
Change all methods in Duke to private in line with OOP Principles
Resolve all warnings for Levels 1-6
Bug fix for excess arguments to "delete" command
Add methods to read from, write to, and create file upon changes to tasklist
Remove unnecessary enum declaration
Bug fixes for readFromFile so that done tasks are reflected properly
Remove enum declaration and add warning fixes
Add functionality to store dates and time as LocalDate and LocalTime respectively
Refactor code into the following classes: Ui, Storage, Parser, TaskList, Command
Divide classes into the following packages: duke, commands, exceptions, parser, storage, tasks, ui
Add JUnit tests for Parser and all Task classes
Correct typo in ListCommand
Add JavaDocs to all classes in duke folder
Add FindCommand to allow search by keywords
Format files to follow coding standard
commitResults.messageBody:
Files not uniformly formatted.
Format files using CheckStyle to ensure uniformaity.

commitResults.messageTitle: Implement gradle to build, run, and run tests for Duke
commitResults.messageBody:
No Javadocs for Duke, Ui, Command, FindCommand, ListCommand, and all Task class.
Cause gradle build to fail.
build.gradle file list the mainClassName as "seedu.duke.Duke".

Gradle build task unable to run.
Gradle run task unable to run.

Add Javadocs for all relevant files.
Change mainClassName from "seedu.duke.Duke" to "duke.Duke"

commitResults.messageTitle: Create GUI Launcher that runs Hello World
commitResults.messageBody: Duke main method returns JavaFX runtime components are missing error.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add GUI for Duke to echo user command
Add spacing between each DialogBox
Refactor Commands to return strings and add GUI functionality
commitResults.messageBody:
Commands use System.out.print to log execution.
GUI implementation does not support input through System.out.print.

GUI implementation only accepts Strings as input.

Modify the execute method in all Command classes to return a string.

commitResults.messageTitle: Bug fixes for deleteCommand and refining GUI
commitResults.messageBody:
DeleteCommand writes to files before removing task.
No welcome message for user present.

Does not remove Task upon DeleteCommand.
Lack of welcome message fails to set context for user.

Fix DeleteCommand to remove task before write to files.
Welcome message added upon initialisation of MainWindow

{why it is done that way}

{any other relevant info}

commitResults.messageTitle: Refine javadocs comments and update helpCommand
commitResults.messageBody:
Javadoc header comments do not start with action verb.
helpCommand only contains functionalities up till delete.

Javadoc header comments need to be standardised in line with Git convention.
helpCommand needs to be updated to include new methods of formatting tasks input and new commands such as find and help.

Javadoc header comments rephrased to start with action verb.
Add in new commands and methods of formatting tasks in helpCommand .

Changing Javadoc comments to match Git convention allows for standardization.
helpCommand contains the most up-to-date information on all commands and formatting.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor Ui, GraphicUi, DoneCommand and DeleteCommand for readability
commitResults.messageBody:
Implementation of Ui and GraphicUi is unneccessarily long.
Each line of Javadoc comments in parameter section starts with non-capitalised letter.
Happy path nested in else statement for DoneCommand and DeleteCommand classes.

Ui and Graphic Ui contain excess code that can be shortened.
Parameter section of Javadoc comments does not conform to Git convention.
DoneCommand and DeleteCommand code is less intuitive and easy to understand.

Replace if-else statements in Ui and GraphicUi with switch-case statements.
Replace first letter of each line of Javadoc comments in parameter section with capitalised letter.
Refactor DoneCommand and DeleteCommand such that happy path is unindented as much as possible.

Ui and GraphicUi more readable.
Javadoc comments adhere to Git convention.
DoneCommand and DeleteCommand more readable.

commitResults.messageTitle: Use assert to ensure commands do not take in illegal descriptions
commitResults.messageBody:
Command classes may take in null descriptions or illegal characters such as '/'.

Create method to check for valid description in abstract Command class.

Ensure that command classes do not take in illegal descriptions.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add DoAfter task functionality
commitResults.messageBody:
Tasks are standalone and do not reference one another.

Tasks in the real world are often linked. May need to complete one task
only after the completion of another task.

Add DoAfter task functionality to keep track of tasks that can only be
done after certain tasks.

Duke better able to handle various tasks.

commitResults.messageTitle: Bug fixes for Command class using assert feature
commitResults.messageBody:
Gradle does not run with assertions enabled.
With assertions enabled, deadline and event command fails.

Duke does not function as it should without deadline and event
command.

Remove checks for '/' character in checkValidDes() method in
Command class.

Both event and deadline command functioning normally.
